casebody.data:
NO. CAAP-17-0000835 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. August 15, 2019.

BANK OF AMERICA, N.A., Successor by Merger to BAC Home Loans Servicing, LP fka Countrywide Home Loans Servicing LP, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Charito Labrador HERMANO, Defendant-Appellant,
and
John Does 1-50; Jane Does 1-50; Doe Partnerships 1-50; Doe Corporations 1-50; Doe Entities 1-50; and Doe Governmental Units 1-50, Defendants

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Affirm.
